content: *this elegant chenille christmas stocking will brighten any mantlepiece lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40313 *clc-stocking pdf* skill level easy level 2 mc lion® chenille article #530 100 yards *yarn discontinued aran weight yarn may be substituted * cc 320-100 fun fur yarn white 1 ball crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm features contrast cuff sew seams and make hanging cord to finish
